body.content:
Dear Gertrude,

How are you and your family doing?. I am Mr. Dennis Marthachris Yaccouba,
the village head of Tongon village here in Ivory Coast. Thanks for your
response to my email. The quality of our gold Dust/Bars. Is bright,
slightly reddish yellow, dense, soft and malleable. I am contacting you for
us to work as a team to achieve success. As a Village head here in Tongon
village, Ivory Coast where they mine gold, a small quantity of Gold has
been given to me every month, so I gathered it up to the tone of 197kg. If
we work with one mind and you did not betray or cheat me, after this first
deal, I will be getting more Gold Dust/Bars on a monthly basis for you to
market and we share the dividend together.

Let trust and honesty be our watch word. I am not asking you to come and
buy the gold from me, if you agree for us to work together, I will ship the
gold dust/bars to you in your country without any formal payment, you will
sell it and we will share the proceeds according to the percentage we will
agree on. All the modalities are in place, only expenses that will be
involved in this business, is the cost of the shipment of the Gold
dust/bars from here in Ivory Coast to your country.

Regarding the sharing percentage, which percentage can we work with. I am a
very understanding person and very simple. I respect agreement. Kindly
provide your telephone number for easy communication.

Waiting to hear from you urgently. Below is my telephone number. You can
call me via telephone/Whats-app

Dennis Marthacchris Yaccouba
marthachris14@yahoo.com
+2250574770360
